title: Add “Schedule today” section linking to Google Form

requirements.text: Add a new “Schedule today” section to the app’s Daily Dashboard page (route “/”) that contains a visible, clickable link to the provided Google Form URL: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfxpu1-1IO77u1JSIYvige65225NJq5bRUSKVnHO7C3N_Nd2Q/viewform

quotes:
Make a section Schedule today

In there add this link:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfxpu1-1IO77u1JSIYvige65225NJq5bRUSKVnHO7C3N_Nd2Q/viewform

acceptanceCriteria: On the Daily Dashboard page (frontend/src/pages/DailyDashboard.tsx), there is a clearly labeled section titled “Schedule today”.
The section includes a clickable link (or button) that opens https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfxpu1-1IO77u1JSIYvige65225NJq5bRUSKVnHO7C3N_Nd2Q/viewform.
The link opens in a new browser tab/window and uses safe external-link attributes (e.g., rel="noopener noreferrer" when applicable).
All user-facing text added for this section is in English.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Backend remains single-actor; no new backend services or external databases.
nonGoals: Adding a new navigation/sidebar item for “Schedule today” (only add the requested section).
Embedding the Google Form directly inside the app via an iframe.
Adding authentication, tracking, or analytics for link clicks.
Any backend changes or persistence related to scheduling.
